summary: A chance encounter with a mysterious young woman leads a documentary filmmaker down a very different road than he intended as he works on his latest project.
cast: Henry Ian Cusick|Nicki Aycox|Stephen Lang|David Margulies|Charles Aitken|James Biberi|Waltrudis Buck|John L. Payne|Tom Morrissey|Nathalie Lyon|John Fugelsang|Alex Vega|Jennifer Nuccitelli|Maria Chinappi|Drew McConnell|Matt Saxon
keywords: filmmaker|train|nonlinear timeline|no opening credits|new york city
title: The Girl on the Train
